testcase.name: TC06_Potential_E2E_validate
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on login page..........................................passed When user enters valid credentials and click on login button................passed Then user should be navigated to home page..................................passed Then user click on New_Potential link.......................................passed And verify that potentialname is enabled....................................passed Then verify that account name should not be enabled.........................passed And Verify that Account name search field is clickable......................passed Then verify that Account Search inside Account Name is enabled by entering name.passed And verify thar Account search inside Cityfield is enabled by entring city name.passed Then verify that search button is able to search............................passed And verify that Potential Information type option count_Three...............passed Then Verify that Potential Information type option is not sorted form.......passed And verify that Potential Information type Lead Source count................passed
